Package it.polimi.ingsw.observer

Class ModelObservable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.ModelObservable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CloudTile, Game, Player, SchoolBoard, Table
public class ModelObservable extends Object
Model Observable This class is extended by the model, and represents an observable object

      public void notifyPlayerOnline(Player message)
      Notifies all the current observers through the update method and passes to them the modified Player Used if the state of a player (online/offline) was modified
      Parameters:
      message - the modified Player to be passed to the observers.

      Parameters:

    • notifyGameOverFromDisconnection

      public void notifyGameOverFromDisconnection()
      Notifies all the current observers through the update method that the player/players previously disconnected didn't reconnect in time for the game, so the only player left is proclaimed winner

    • notifyEnoughPlayerOnline

      public void notifyEnoughPlayerOnline(boolean message)
      Notifies all the current observers through the update method if there are enough player online
      Parameters:
      message - true if there are enough player to continue playing, false otherwise

    • notifyWinners

      public void notifyWinners(List<String> message)
      Notifies all the current observers through the update method and passes to them the winners' nicknames
      Parameters:
      message - the winners' nicknames to be passed to the observers.
